description.english: Unlock the power to warp your dreams
description.german: Entfessle die Macht, deine Träume zu verwandeln
description.french: Eveille le pouvoir de transformer tes rêves
description.italian: Sblocca il potere di distorcere il sogno
description.spanish: Desbloquea el poder para cambiar tus sueños
description.russian: Откройте способность изменять сны

description.english: Defeat Hansel and Gretel
description.german: Besiege Hänsel + Gretel
description.french: Débarasse-toi de Hansel + Gretel
description.italian: Sconfiggi Hansel + Gretel
description.spanish: Vence a Hansel y Gretel
description.russian: Одержите победу над Гензелем и Гретель

description.english: Defeat Octor Freud
description.german: Besiege Oktor Freud
description.french: Débarasse-toi de Octor Freud
description.italian: Sconfiggi Octor Freud
description.spanish: Vence a Octor Freud
description.russian: Одержите победу над Октором Фрейдом

description.english: Defeat Gurglewocky
description.german: Besiege Gurglewocky
description.french: Débarasse-toi de Gargouillocky
description.italian: Sconfiggi il Dragorgoglio
description.spanish: Vence a Gorgotón
description.russian: Одержите победу над Турбоглотом

description.english: Land on an owl while twirling
description.german: Lande während eines Wirbelsprungs auf einer Eule
description.french: Atteris sur un hibou en faisant und pirouette
description.italian: Atterra su un gufo mentre compi una piroetta
description.spanish: Cae sobre un búho realizando un giro
description.russian: Совершите пируэт и приземлитесь на сову

description.english: Collect a red gem while twirling
description.german: Sammle während eines Wirbelsprungs einen roten Diamanten auf
description.french: Ramasse une gemme rouge en faisant une pirouette
description.italian: Raccogli una gemma rossa mentre compi una piroetta
description.spanish: Recoge una gema mientras realizas un giro
description.russian: Подберите красный алмаз во время пируэта

description.english: Collect a yellow gem while dashing
description.german: Sammle während eine Dash-Attacke einen gelben Diamanten auf
description.french: Ramasse une gemme jaune en faisant une attaque dash
description.italian: Raccogli una gemma gialla mentre compi uno slancio
description.spanish: Recoge una gema amarilla mientras realizas un ataque
description.russian: Подберите желтый алмаз во время рывка

description.english: Jump or dash onto three owls without touching the ground
description.german: Besiege drei Eulen, ohne den Boden zu berühren
description.french: Débarasse-toi de trois hiboux sans toucher le sol
description.italian: Colpisci tre gufi senza toccare terra usando salti o slanci
description.spanish: Salta o ataca a tres búhos sin tocar el suelo
description.russian: Победите трех сов с помощью прыжка или рывка, не касаясь земли

description.english: Bounce off a falling turtle
description.german: Pralle von einer fallenden Schildkröte ab
description.french: Rebondis sur une tortue en pleine chute
description.italian: Rimbalza contro una tartaruga in caduta libera
description.spanish: Rebota sobre una tortuga caída
description.russian: Оттолкнитесь от падающей черепахи

description.english: Use a spiky box like a trampoline
description.german: Verwende eine Stachelschachtel wie ein Trampolin
description.french: Utilise une boite hérisson comme un tremplin
description.italian: Usa una Cassa pungente come trampolino
description.spanish: Usa una caja punzante como trampolín.
description.russian: Используйте шипастый ящик в качестве батута

description.english: Avoid spikes by ducking
description.german: Weiche Stacheln aus, indem du dich duckst
description.french: Evite des pics en te baissant
description.italian: Evita spuntoni acuminati abbassandoti
description.spanish: Esquiva pinchos agachándote
description.russian: Пригнитесь, чтобы избежать удара о шипы

description.english: Collect all gems in the game
description.german: Sammle alle Diamanten im Spiel ein
description.french: Ramasse toutes les gemmes dans le jeu
description.italian: Raccogli tutte le gemme
description.spanish: Recoge todas las gemas del juego
description.russian: Соберите все алмазы в игре

description.english: Obtain five stars in all levels
description.german: Erlange fünf Sterne in jedem Level
description.french: Obtiens cinq étoiles dans chaque niveau
description.italian: Ottieni cinque stelle in tutti i livelli
description.spanish: Obtén cinco estrellas en todos los niveles
description.russian: Получите пять звезд на каждом из уровней

description.english: Unlock Hardcore Mode
description.german: Schalte den Hardcoremodus frei
description.french: Déverrouille le mode Hardcore
description.italian: Sblocca la modalità Irriducibile
description.spanish: Desbloquea el modo Difícil
description.russian: Откройте режим ХАРДКОР!

description.english: Unlock Über Hardcore Mode
description.german: Schalte den Über-Hardcoremodus frei
description.french: Déverrouille le mode Super Hardcore
description.italian: Sblocca la modalità Uber irriducibile
description.spanish: Desbloquea el modo Muy Difícil
description.russian: Откройте режим СУПЕРХАРДКОР!

description.english: Obtain a trophy in all Time Attack levels
description.german: Erlange eine Trophäe in jedem Time Attack-Level
description.french: Obtiens une trophée dans chaque niveau Time Attack
description.italian: Ottieni un trofeo in tutti i livelli Time Attack
description.spanish: Obtén un trofeo en todos los niveles Contrarreloj
description.russian: Получите награду на всех уровнях в режиме "игра на время".

description.english: Obtain a trophy in all Score Attack levels
description.german: Erlange eine Trophäe in jedem Score Attack-Level
description.french: Obtiens une trophée dans chaque niveau Score Attack
description.italian: Ottieni un trofeo in tutti i livelli Score Attack
description.spanish: Obtén un trofeo en todos los niveles de Puntuación
description.russian: Получите награду на всех уровнях в режиме "игра на счет".

description.english: Complete the first world in Über Hardcore Mode
description.german: Spiele im Über-Hardcore-Modus durch die erste Welt
description.french: Complète le premier monde en mode Super Hardcore
description.italian: Completa il primo mondo in modalità Uber irriducibile
description.spanish: Completa el primer mundo en Muy Difícil
description.russian: Пройдите первый мир в режиме СУПЕРХАРДКОР!

description.english: Complete the second world in Über Hardcore Mode
description.german: Spiele im Über-Hardcore-Modus durch die zweite Welt
description.french: Complète le deuxième monde en mode Super Hardcore
description.italian: Completa il secondo mondo in modalità Uber irriducibile
description.spanish: Completa el segundo mundo en Muy Difícil
description.russian: Пройдите второй мир в режиме СУПЕРХАРДКОР!

description.english: Complete the game in Über Hardcore Mode
description.german: Spiele das Spiel im Über-Hardcore-Modus durch
description.french: Complète le jeu en mode Super Hardcore
description.italian: Completa il terzo mondo in modalità Uber irriducibile
description.spanish: Completa el juego en Muy Difícil
description.russian: Пройдите игру в режиме СУПЕРХАРДКОР!

description.english: Complete a Dream Rush race
Unlock Cosmonaut Comrade from the SpeedRunners game by completing a race in three different Dream Rush levels
Have a human win a race against bots in a Dream Rush level
Have a human win a race against bots in two different Dream Rush levels
Have a human win a race against bots in three different Dream Rush levels
